turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'm looking to pick up some pizzas for dinner on my way home from the Bella Luna Pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, how many pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Two small thick-crust pizzas. I want one to be with hot peppers and olives. And the other with pepperoni, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so 2 small thick crust pizzas. one with hot peppers and olives. the other with pepperoni, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Excellent. How long till it's ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they will be ready in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. That sounds good. Thank you.
